== Running JUnit Tests via Ant
Ant allows to run http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/JUnit/article.html">JUnit tests. Ant defines junit task. You only need to include the junit.jar and the compiled classes into the classpath for Ant and then you can run JUnit tests. See http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/JUnit/article.html">JUnit Tutorial for an introduction into JUnit.
